'''Sneaky Wu''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in {{Quest|Mighty Cyclops' Adventure!}}.

In {{Quest|Teucer's Terrific Tour}}, he and his two brothers were trying to make a deal with Tartaglia when negotiations broke down as [[Teucer]] and the [[Traveler]] interrupt the meeting.
